element.name: Button
element.description: RWT Buttons, including push-buttons, toggle-buttons, radio-buttons and check-boxes.

property.name: color
property.description: Text color for buttons.

property.name: background-color
property.description: Background color for buttons.

property.name: background-image
property.description: Background image for buttons.

property.name: background-position
property.description: Background image position for buttons.

property.name: background-repeat
property.description: Background image repetition for buttons.

property.name: border
property.description: The border that is drawn around buttons.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border for buttons.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border for buttons.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border for buttons.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border for buttons.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: Border radius. The border radius has no effect if an enhanced border, like "inset" or "outset" is used.

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the button. A value between 0 and 1.

property.name: text-decoration
property.description: Decoration for button text.

property.name: animation
property.description: Supports animations-types "hoverIn" and "hoverOut". Others are ignored.

property.name: cursor
property.description: Control's cursor.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding (inner distance) for buttons.

property.name: spacing
property.description: Space between text and image.

property.name: font
property.description: Font for button text.

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: Shadow for text.

property.name: box-shadow
property.description: A shadow effect for button.

style.name: PUSH
style.description: Indicates that the button is a push button.

style.name: TOGGLE
style.description: Indicates that the button is a toggle button.

style.name: CHECK
style.description: Indicates that the button is a check box.

style.name: RADIO
style.description: Indicates that the button is a radio button.

style.name: ARROW
style.description: Indicates that the button is a arrow button.

style.name: FLAT
style.description: Indicates that the button should have a flat appearance.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the button should have a border.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over a button.

state.name: pressed
state.description: Applies while a button is pressed.

state.name: selected
state.description: Applies for selected TOGGLE, CHECK and RADIO buttons.

element.name: Button-CheckIcon
element.description: The icon to indicate the check and/or grayed state of a Button with style CHECK

property.name: background-image
property.description: Icon image of the check box.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over the check box.

state.name: grayed
state.description: Applies when the check box is grayed.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies when the button is disabled.

state.name: focused
state.description: Applies when the button is focused.

element.name: Button-RadioIcon
element.description: The icon to indicate the selected state of a Button with style RADIO

property.name: background-image
property.description: Icon image of the radio button.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over the radio button.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies when the button is disabled.

state.name: focused
state.description: Applies when the button is focused.

element.name: Button-ArrowIcon
element.description: The icon of a Button with style ARROW

property.name: background-image
property.description: Icon image of the arrow button.

state.name: hover
state.description: Applies while the user hovers over the arrow button.

state.name: disabled
state.description: Applies when the button is disabled.

style.name: UP
style.description: Indicates that the arrow button points upwards.

style.name: DOWN
style.description: Indicates that the arrow button points downwards.

style.name: LEFT
style.description: Indicates that the arrow button points leftwards.

style.name: RIGHT
style.description: Indicates that the arrow button points rightwards.

element.name: Button-FocusIndicator
element.description: The frame that is drawn when the button is focused.

property.name: background-color
property.description: The fill-color of the frame.

property.name: border
property.description: The border of the frame. 3D-styles inset, outset, etc are not supported.

property.name: border-top
property.description: The top side border of the frame.

property.name: border-right
property.description: The right side border of the frame.

property.name: border-bottom
property.description: The bottom side border of the frame.

property.name: border-left
property.description: The left side border of the frame.

property.name: padding
property.description: The padding between the frame and the buttons text. If this is set to "0px", margin will be used to layout the FocusIndicator.

property.name: margin
property.description: The margin between the buttons border and the frame. Only used if padding is set to "0px".

property.name: opacity
property.description: The opacity of the indicator. A value between 0 and 1.

style.name: ARROW
style.description: Indicates that the button is a arrow button.

style.name: PUSH
style.description: Indicates that the button is a push button.

style.name: TOGGLE
style.description: Indicates that the button is a toggle button.

style.name: CHECK
style.description: Indicates that the button is a check box.

style.name: RADIO
style.description: Indicates that the button is a radio button.

style.name: FLAT
style.description: Indicates that the button should have a flat appearance.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the button should have a border.
